thread.title: Spiffy, On-Demand Mobile Car Wash Solution, Expands to Charlotte
thread.title_full: Spiffy, On-Demand Mobile Car Wash Solution, Expands to Charlotte - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Spiffy, On-Demand Mobile Car Wash Solution, Expands to Charlotte
text:
Get Spiffy Inc.
"Spiffy's convenient, trusted and professional solution redefines the car wash and detailing experience in the Queen City"
CHARLOTTE, N.C. , Aug. 27, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Get Spiffy Inc., the RTP headquartered developer of the Spiffy App and the operator of the Spiffy Mobile Car Washing And Detailing service announces an expansion to its' second city in Charlotte, North Carolina .
"Today we launch our service in Charlotte !" said CEO Karl Murphy . "We began our expansion into Charlotte in May with the hiring and training of a world-class team of technicians and managers. Simultaneously we began developing partnerships with leading businesses in the market to offer Spiffy to their employees as a zero-cost employee benefit." Charlotte clients can now use the Spiffy app to schedule, track and pay for their services in the Greater Charlotte Metro Area. Spiffy clients will never have to visit a traditional car wash again.
Executive Chairman Scot Wingo said, "expanding to an "NFL" city from our home in Raleigh is a key milestone in the growth of our business and shows that our management team has developed the systems and procedures needed to grow while continuing to deliver a superior customer experience."
Spiffy on-demand car washing is available via App (Apple and Android) and from the website www.getspiffynow.com .
ABOUT SPIFFY:
Spiffy ( www.GetSpiffyNow.com ) is a technology and services company with a mission to redefine the car washing experience everywhere. Founded by car wash owner Karl Murphy and backed by serial entrepreneur Scot Wingo , Spiffy offers an app that turns any parking spot into a car wash. The Spiffy app allows clients to schedule, track and pay for car washing and detailing services at the time and location of their choosing and is available for download in the Apple App Store and on Google Play.
